name: Kiopioke Alpha
description:
A refinement of the mechanics of the Kiopioke prototype. Jump, dash, poke, climb, fling, and dodge through over 80 levels. Currently in development and seeking feedback.

Improvements include:

  • Fixed framerate with low specs - should run well on most computers
  • Enhanced gamepad and keyboard gameplay
  • Fewer character and physics glitches

Discord: https://discord.gg/JVQ9Q8Fe3q
